channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 06:44 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:44 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
